title: Latin (1906) Hexaglot Bible (Eng Fre Ger Heb Grk) Vol 1-6
description:
Latin (1906) Hexaglot Bible (Eng Fre Ger Heb Grk) Vol 1-6

The Hexaglot Bible, published in 1906, is a comprehensive multilingual edition of the Holy Scriptures, encompassing both the Old and New Testaments. This edition uniquely presents the biblical texts in their original languages alongside various translations. The Old Testament is available in Hebrew, Greek, Latin, English, German, and French, while the New Testament is presented in Greek, Syriac, Latin, English, German, and French. The Hexaglot Bible also includes the Septuagint (the Greek translation of the Old Testament) and the Syriac version of the New Testament, as well as the Vulgate, the Authorized English, and the most recognized German and French versions. These texts are arranged in parallel columns for easy comparison and study. This edition is an invaluable resource for scholars and students interested in biblical studies, linguistics, and the historical evolution of biblical translations.
